categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic short stories

nodes.text: One Night in the Dealer's Den

"One Night in the Dealer's Den" is a short story published in the developer blog for Star Wars: The Old Republic on February 13, 2015. It depicts a mission by the Republic Strategic Information Service agents Theron Shan and Jonas Balkar in the aftermath of the events of the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion.
